articles.content:
There's nothing like a spot of bracing sea air in the sunshine to lift the spirits.
And maybe that's just what Boris Johnson and his family needed as they headed to the coast away from the pressures… [+2048 chars]

articles.author: Berny Torre
articles.title: Actor Sidney Poitier's family mourn their ‘guiding light’ - Daily Express
articles.description: THE family of trailblazing actor Sidney Poitier have told of their grief at his death as fans laid flowers on his HollywoodWalk of Fame star.

articles.author: Millie Payne
articles.title: John Torode and Lisa Faulkner discuss falling in love and navigating their blended family - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a new interview with The Sunday Times, the culinary duo got candid about their first encounter, cooking and family, with John admitting there has been a 'black mark' about when the pair met.
articles.content:
John Torode and Lisa Faulkner have opened up about their romance and navigating their blended family. 
The celebrity chefs, 56 and 49 respectively, wed in 2019 - the second time for them both after … [+3683 chars]
